title: Sergey Lavrov
summary: Sergey Viktorovich Lavrov (Russian: Сергей Викторович Лавров, IPA: [sʲɪrˈɡʲej ˈvʲiktərəvʲɪtɕ lɐˈvrof]; born 21 March 1950) is a Russian diplomat and politician who has served as the Foreign Minister of Russia since 2004. He is the longest-serving foreign minister since the fall of the Soviet Union.Lavrov served as the Permanent Representative of Russia to the United Nations from 1994 to 2004.
